name: Windows Defender Exclusion Set
description: Detects scenarios where an windows defender exclusion was added in registry where an entity would want to bypass antivirus scanning from windows defender
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:(4657 OR 4656 OR 4660 OR 4663) AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ll][Uu][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\\.*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:(4657 OR 4656 OR 4660 OR 4663) AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Exclusions\\*)`
